mapper.select: select instanceId, instanceName, modelName, processId, instanceParams, status from sys_instance
mapper.update: update sys_instance set instanceName = #{instanceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modelName = #{modelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, processId = #{processId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, instanceParams = #{instanceParams,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = =#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where instanceId = #{instanceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
